title: 2018 2 bedroom Manufactured Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Renting a home at Oakland Glens, a family-friendly, well-maintained, professionally managed manufactured home community.
Oakland Glens is proud to be located in the Walled Lake School District, and within miles of many local dining, shopping, and entertainment venues!
This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom home is 960 sq feet and sits on a perimeter site!
Call today to learn more about making this home your own — this one won't last long!
